channel.title: Developer Forums
channel.copyright: 2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: PlayStation®Suite renamed "PlayStation®Mobile"
item.description: SCE is positioned to proliferate the world of PlayStation across mobile devices with the progress of content development and the expansion of PlayStation Certified devices. In conjunction with this development, SCE will rename PlayStation®Suite to PlayStation®Mobile, and position it as a new platform.

item.title: New Suggestions board
item.description: We now have the new Suggestion board. The new Suggestions system is now in place of the old Suggestion Board. Please feel free to post your suggestions and ideas to the new board. We have some improvement in the interface. All suggestions and ideas are now separated and you can comment on each post as well as giving kudos to the ones you like the most. The old Suggestion board is still open for a little while and we renamed it to 'Suggestions [Archive]'. Of course we have taken note of all your previous suggestions but if you would like you can re-create them to the new Suggestions board.

item.title: The forums have had an update!
item.description:
As some of you may have already noticed, the forums have had a redesign at thread level. There are several new features for you to try out...

Print Button : You now have the ability to click the 'Printer' button which will launch a printer friendly version of the forums, ideal for technical support walkthroughs.

Community Team Highlighted : Posts from members of the community team are now surrounded by a blue border making them easier to distinguish.

Hover Over functionality on Avatars/ID : Hovering your mouse over a users avatar or ID on the forums will bring up an information box about that user with details about their last posts, post count, rank, signature and post count.

Facebook/Twitter social media buttons : You now have the option to share posts from the forums on either Facebook or Twitter by simply clicking the relevant button at the bottom of each post.

A New Solution section To better highlight of accepted solutions

 Any feedback you have regarding the changes, pop it in this thread!
